featured.text: Jack: I wish I were a millionaire.
Sue: No, but I wish I could.
They made the statues in the temples drink wine as they wished.
Accordingly, anyone who wishes to love and be loved will want to establish lasting relationships.

other.text: Mr. Liu: Well, I wish I agree with you, but I don’t.

definition.zh_def: 希望或渴望某事發生或實現的感情或行為。
definition.en_def: A desire or longing for something to happen or to be true.
definition.example: I wish for peace and happiness in the world.
